locations.Fairy Pot:
has_bottle and
                ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and three_heart_heat and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic))) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and three_heart_heat and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic))))

exits.Fire Temple Boss Room:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and 
                ((unknown_heart_heat and logic_fire_boss_door_jump) or
                (unknown_heart_heat and Hover_Boots) or
                (unknown_heart_heat and at('Fire Temple Upper', can_play(Song_of_Time) or has_explosives)))

locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door C:
is_adult and
                ((Bombs and three_heart_heat and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic))) or
                (has_bombchus and three_heart_heat and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic))))
locations.Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room:
is_adult and
                ((can_play(Song_of_Time) and three_heart_heat and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic))) or
                (logic_fire_song_of_time and three_heart_heat and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic))))

exits.Fire Temple Middle:
is_adult and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4) and
                (((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                    (unknown_heart_heat and Bombs) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and has_bombchus) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and Bow)) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and Progressive_Hookshot)) or
                (logic_fire_strength and
                    (unknown_heart_heat and Bombs) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and has_bombchus) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and Bow)) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and Progressive_Hookshot))

exits.Fire Temple Upper:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or 
                ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 7) and
                    ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer)) or logic_fire_flame_maze))

locations.Fire Temple Highest Goron Chest:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and 
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) or (logic_rusted_switches and 
                    (can_use(Hover_Boots) or has_explosives)))
